original_text: When his family heard about this, they went to take charge of him, for they said, “He is out of his mind.”
korean_text: 예수의 친족들이 듣고 그를 붙들러 나오니 이는 그가 미쳤다 함일러라

sentences.original_text: When his family heard about this
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 가족이 이 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: they went to take charge of him
He is out of his mind
